items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 85 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 18!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 25 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 10 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 4)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 20 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 5!

beer.beer_name: The Bark Is Worse Than the Bite

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 130 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 27!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 260 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 53!
And just like that we say goodbye to 2019!  Cheers to 2020 and all the delicious beer adventures to come! Happy New Year from Untappd!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 115 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 24!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 10!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 60 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 13.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 175 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 36!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 44)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 45!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 55 check-ins with a photo.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 85 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 18!
It’s the most wonderful time for a beer! We wish you and yours a truly happy and wonderful brew-mas.
This Hanukkah we hope you are celebrating all eight nights with friends, family and great beer.  Happy Hanukkah from all of us at Untappd!

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 25 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 130 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 27!

Thanks to you, our dream of having a Mad Elf on every holiday table is even closer! Brewed with 25,000 pounds of local honey, this ruby red creation is bursting with notes of ripened cherries, raw honey, cocoa and cinnamon. troegs.com/brewfinder
